org.cooperari

Class CSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cooperari.CSystem

  • public final class CSystem
extends Object
    Cooperari system facade.

    Note that some methods can only be called from code that is already running cooperatively, for instance from a JUnit test method that is being executed using Cooperari's custom JUnit runner (CJUnitRunner). These methods will throw CNonCooperativeModeError otherwise.

    Since:
    0.2

    • Method Detail

      • executeTest

        public CTestResult executeTest(CTest test)
        Execute a cooperative test session.
        Parameters:
        test - Test to execute.
        Returns:
        An instance of CTestResult.

      • forkAndJoin

        public static void forkAndJoin(Runnable... runnables)
        Start some threads and wait until they are finished ("fork and join"). The threads will execute cooperatively if cooperative semantics are enabled, otherwise execution will run under normal (preemptive semantics).
        Parameters:
        runnables - Runnable instances.
        Throws:
        IllegalThreadStateException - if any of the runnable instances is an already alive Thread object.
        CNonCooperativeModeError - If the method is invoked by a non-cooperative thread.

      • hotspot

        public static void hotspot(String id)
                    throws CHotspotError
        Signal that a hotspot has been reached.

        Place a call to this method in application code to mark a point where an hotspot of interest has been reached. Reachability conditions may be marked in test methods using reachability annotations like CAlways, CSometimes, and CNever.

        Parameters:
        id - Hotspot id.
        Throws:
        CHotspotError - if id is a CNever hotspot.
        See Also:
        hotspot(String, boolean)

      • hotspot

        public static void hotspot(String id,
                           boolean condition)
                    throws CHotspotError
        Signal that a hotspot has been reached, subject to a boolean condition.

        cHotspot(id, condition); is equivalent to if (condition) cHotspot(id);

        Parameters:
        id - Hotspot id.
        condition - Boolean condition value.
        Throws:
        CHotspotError - if the condition == true and id is a CNever hotspot.
        See Also:
        hotspot(String)

      • sendSpuriousWakeup

        public static void sendSpuriousWakeup(Thread t)
        Simulate a spurious thread wakeup.
        Parameters:
        t - Target thread.
        Throws:
        CNonCooperativeModeError - If the method is invoked by a non-cooperative thread.

      • getGlobalCoverageInfo

        public static CCoverage getGlobalCoverageInfo()
        Get global coverage information for all tests executed so far.
        Returns:
        An instance of CCoverage.

      • generateGlobalCoverageReport

        public static File generateGlobalCoverageReport()
                                         throws IOException
        Generate a global coverage report.
        Returns:
        File object indicating the generated report.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • inCooperativeMode

        public static boolean inCooperativeMode()
        Check if the system is in cooperative mode.
        Returns:
        true if cooperative semantics are enabled.
